titles.title: Safeguarding Awards for Victims and Enforcement Settlements Act of 2020
Safeguarding Awards for Victims and Enforcement Settlements Act of 2020
Safeguarding Awards for Victims and Enforcement Settlements Act of 2020
A bill to limit donations made pursuant to settlement agreements to which the United States is a party, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
